summary: This is an email chain from July 24, 2019, discussing a medical or psychological assessment of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (BOP #76318-054) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The correspondence involves a Chief Psychologist and other staff, referencing an 'SRA' (possibly a Suicide Risk Assessment) conducted the previous day, close to an unspecified 'incident'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email chain, identified by his Bureau of Prisons number #76318-054. The discussion pertains to a psychological assessment (SRA) conducted on him the day prior to the email.

persons.name: Chief Psychologist
persons.role: Chief Psychologist, Federal Bureau of Prisons
persons.context: The sender of the forwarded email, a staff member at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, part of the U.S. Department of Justice/Federal Bureau of Prisons.

connections.description: The Chief Psychologist is a Bureau of Prisons staff member responsible for conducting or overseeing a Suicide Risk Assessment (SRA) for inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: SRA Conducted on Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A Suicide Risk Assessment (SRA) was performed on inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Email Discussion Regarding Epstein's Assessment
events.description: An email chain discusses who should handle a follow-up regarding Epstein's SRA from the previous day, referencing its proximity to an unspecified 'incident'.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 24, 2019, concerning inmate Jeffrey Epstein (BOP #76318-054).
It references a Suicide Risk Assessment (SRA) conducted on Epstein on July 23, 2019, the day before the email.
The email implies an unspecified 'incident' occurred close to the time of the SRA, making the assessment particularly relevant.
The correspondence involves a Chief Psychologist at the Federal Bureau of Prisons' Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The tone suggests internal staff coordination regarding the appropriate personnel to handle Epstein's psychological evaluation follow-up.
